IntVectorProperty.name: Subcube Size
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set subcube size. This can only be set once before the first rendering

IntVectorProperty.name: Subcube Border
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set subcube border size, multiplied by 2 internally

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Step size
DoubleVectorProperty.name: volume_step_size
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the distance between two sample points during volume raycasting. Use with care!!, extreme values can lead to performance or quality degradation. Default = 1.0 is best for most situations.

IntVectorProperty.name: Opacity Mode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Opacity Modes Voxel : Reference distance is one voxel. Volume : Reference distance is volume dimensions. Custom : Reference distance is user defined.

IntVectorProperty.name: Filter
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: It selects the element to be visualized.

IntVectorProperty.label: Samples
IntVectorProperty.name: depth_samples
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set number of samples along the ray

IntVectorProperty.label: Samples
IntVectorProperty.name: edge_samples
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set number of samples along the ray

StringVectorProperty.label: Kernel
StringVectorProperty.name: custom_kernel
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Load a custom IndeX volume XAC kernel.

Property.label: Update kernel
Property.name: custom_update_kernel
Property.Documentation: Update the current IndeX volume XAC kernel

SettingsProxy.name: NvidiaIndexSettings
SettingsProxy.label: NVIDIA IndeX
SettingsProxy.Documentation: General settings for the NVIDIA IndeX plugin.

IntVectorProperty.name: LogLevel
IntVectorProperty.label: Log Level For 'Output Messages'
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: NVIDIA IndeX log messages with this severity level or higher will appear in the 'Output Messages' window.

IntVectorProperty.name: LogLevelStandardOutput
IntVectorProperty.label: Log Level For Standard Output
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: NVIDIA IndeX log messages with the severity level or higher will be written to standard output (console). Log message written to the 'Output Messages' window will typically also appear on standard output.

IntVectorProperty.name: LogTimestamp
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Add a timestamp to each log message.

IntVectorProperty.name: LogHostname
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Add the hostname to each log message.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputPerformanceValues
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Write performance statistics to a file or to standard output after each rendered frame.

StringVectorProperty.name: OutputPerformanceValuesFilename
StringVectorProperty.label: Filename
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: If non-empty, the performance statistics will be written to this file. Otherwise standard output will be used.

IntVectorProperty.name: ExportSession
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Write the internal state information of NVIDIA IndeX to a file or to standard output after each rendered frame.

StringVectorProperty.name: ExportSessionFilename
StringVectorProperty.label: Filename
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: If non-empty, the session export will be written to this file. Otherwise standard output will be used.

IntVectorProperty.name: ClusterMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Network mode for running in cluster mode. Running NVIDIA IndeX in cluster mode requires a valid cluster license.

StringVectorProperty.name: ClusterInterfaceAddress
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the network interface to be used for outgoing packets. Optional, but recommend when there are multiple network interfaces. If not set, a network interface will be chosen automatically, which might not always be the right one. This may also be an interface name, but it must be the same on all hosts. The string may end with ':' and a port number to select which port to listen on for UDP and TCP unicast traffic. If no port is set and unicast only mode is set, port 10000 will be used.

StringVectorProperty.name: MulticastAddress
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Only used when cluster mode is set to UDP.

StringVectorProperty.name: DiscoveryAddress
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Only used when cluster mode is set to TCP_WITH_DISCOVERY.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseRDMA
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable Remote Direct Memory Access for InfiniBand.

StringVectorProperty.name: RDMAInterface
StringVectorProperty.label: RDMA Interface Address
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Address of the network interface to use for RDMA.

StringVectorProperty.name: RDMAInterfaceByName
StringVectorProperty.label: RDMA Interface Name
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Name of the network interface to use for RDMA. If set, this will be used instead of 'RDMA Interface Address'.

StringVectorProperty.name: ExtraConfiguration
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Additional low-level configuration options for NVIDIA IndeX. Must be specified as 'key=value'.

StringVectorProperty.name: VendorKey
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Activate a custom NVIDIA IndeX license. Leave empty to use the default license.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowSecretKey
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: View or modify the Secret Key.

StringVectorProperty.name: SecretKey
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Activate a custom NVIDIA IndeX license. Leave empty to use the default license.
